judgement.en: Pure, sublime, fruitful, persistent. Supreme success. Through perseverance, the way comes into being.
judgement.zh: 元亨利贞。大亨以正。
judgement.hi: शुद्ध, उत्कृष्ट, फलदायी, लगातार। सर्वोच्च सफलता।
judgement.es: Puro, sublime, fructífero, persistente. Supremo éxito.
judgement.fr: Pur, sublime, fructueux, persistant. Succès suprême.
judgement.ja: 純粋で崇高で、実り豊かで、永続的。至高の成功。

image.en: Heaven moves powerfully. The superior person strengthens himself without rest.
image.zh: 天行健，君子以自强不息。
image.hi: आकाश शक्तिशाली रूप से चलता है। श्रेष्ठ व्यक्ति बिना आराम के खुद को मजबूत करता है।
image.es: El cielo se mueve poderosamente. La persona superior se fortalece sin descanso.
image.fr: Le ciel se déplace avec puissance. La personne supérieure se renforce sans repos.
image.ja: 天が力強く動く。君子は休むことなく自分を強化する。

interpretation.en: The Creative represents the pure yang energy of heaven. This is the most powerful hexagram, symbolizing leadership, initiative, and the creative force that brings new things into being. The time is right for bold action and decisive leadership. Success comes through persistence and unwavering commitment to your goals. This hexagram encourages you to take initiative and exercise strong leadership.
interpretation.zh: 乾代表纯阳能量，最强大的卦象，象征领导力、主动性和创造力。
interpretation.hi: सृजनात्मक स्वर्ग की शुद्ध यांग ऊर्जा का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
interpretation.es: Lo Creativo representa la energía yang pura del cielo.
interpretation.fr: Le Créateur représente l'énergie yang pure du ciel.
interpretation.ja: 創造は天の純粋な陽エネルギーを表します。

keywords.en: Power, Leadership, Initiative, Success, Creative Force
keywords.zh: 力量, 领导力, 主动性, 成功, 创造力
keywords.ja: 力、リーダーシップ、率先

meaning.fr: Cette ligne de The Creative indique le développement à l'étape 1.

judgement.en: The Receptive brings about sublime success, furthering through the perseverance of a mare.
judgement.zh: 元亨，利牝马之贞。
judgement.fr: Le Réceptif apporte un succès sublime.
judgement.ja: 受容は崇高な成功をもたらします。

image.en: The earth's condition is receptive devotion. The superior person carries the outer world.
image.zh: 地势坤，君子以厚德载物。
image.hi: पृथ्वी की स्थिति ग्रहणशील भक्ति है।
image.es: La condición de la tierra es devoción receptiva.
image.fr: La condition de la terre est la dévotion réceptive.
image.ja: 大地の状態は受容的な献身です。

interpretation.en: The Receptive represents pure yin energy - the power of earth, nurturing, and support. This hexagram teaches the value of receptivity, patience, and allowing things to develop naturally. Do not force situations. Instead, provide a supportive foundation for growth. Be patient and receptive to help from others.
interpretation.zh: 坤代表纯阴能量，象征大地、养育和支持的力量。
interpretation.hi: ग्रहणशील शुद्ध यिन ऊर्जा का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
interpretation.es: Lo Receptivo representa la energía yin pura.
interpretation.fr: Le Réceptif représente l'énergie yin pure.
interpretation.ja: 受容は純粋な陰のエネルギーを表します。

keywords.en: Receptivity, Nurturing, Patience, Support, Earth
keywords.zh: 接纳, 培育, 耐心, 支持, 大地

judgement.en: Creation brings tumult. In the midst of difficulty, perseverance brings success.
judgement.zh: 元亨利贞。勿用有攸往，利建侯。
judgement.hi: सृजन अशांति लाता है। कठिनाई के बीच, दृढ़ता सफलता लाती है।
judgement.es: La creación trae tumulto. En medio de dificultad, la perseverancia trae éxito.
judgement.fr: La création apporte le tumulte. Au milieu de la difficulté, la persévérance apporte le succès.
judgement.ja: 創造は混乱をもたらす。困難の中で、忍耐が成功をもたらします。

image.en: Clouds and thunder: Difficulty at the Beginning. The superior person brings order out of chaos.
image.zh: 云雷屯，君子以经纶。
image.hi: बादल और गड़गड़ाहट: शुरुआत में कठिनाई।
image.es: Nubes y trueno: Dificultad al Principio.
image.fr: Nuages et tonnerre: Difficulté au Début.

interpretation.en: All beginnings are difficult. You are facing initial obstacles and confusion. Despite the difficulty, this is a time of great creative potential. Persistence and methodical work will overcome the chaos. Maintain discipline and work through obstacles one by one.
interpretation.zh: 所有开始都是困难的。你面临初期障碍和困惑。
interpretation.hi: सभी शुरुआत कठिन हैं। आप प्रारंभिक बाधाओं का सामना कर रहे हैं।
interpretation.es: Todos los principios son difíciles. Te enfrentas a obstáculos iniciales.
interpretation.fr: Tous les débuts sont difficiles. Vous faites face à des obstacles initiaux.
interpretation.ja: すべての始まりは困難です。初期の障害に直面しています。

keywords.en: Obstacles, Persistence, Beginnings, Discipline, Order
keywords.zh: 障碍, 坚持, 开始, 纪律, 秩序

judgement.en: Youthful Folly (Hexagram 4): Immaturity requiring education and development. The ancient wisdom of the I Ching speaks to your situation through this configuration of energy. This hexagram represents one of the 64 fundamental patterns of change.
judgement.zh: 蒙（第4卦）：Immaturity requiring education and development。易经的古老智慧通过这种能量配置与你对话。
judgement.hi: Youthful Folly: Immaturity requiring education and development
judgement.es: Youthful Folly: Immaturity requiring education and development
judgement.fr: Youthful Folly: Immaturity requiring education and development
judgement.ja: Youthful Folly：Immaturity requiring education and development

image.en: The symbolic meaning of Youthful Folly reflects the interplay of the trigrams that form this hexagram. Each of the 64 hexagrams represents a unique pattern of change, and this one speaks specifically to the theme of Immaturity requiring education and development.
image.zh: 蒙的象征意义反映了组成此卦的卦象之间的相互作用。
image.es: El significado simbólico de Youthful Folly
image.fr: La signification symbolique de Youthful Folly

interpretation.en: Youthful Folly represents the pattern of energy and change in your life right now. The central theme is Immaturity requiring education and development. This hexagram is distinct from all others - each of the 64 hexagrams offers unique wisdom. Consider how Immaturity requiring education and development applies to your current situation, decisions, and path forward. The I Ching provides not rigid rules but profound insights into the patterns of transformation.
interpretation.zh: 蒙代表你此刻能量的模式。中心主题是Immaturity requiring education and development。
interpretation.hi: Youthful Folly आपके जीवन में अभी ऊर्जा और परिवर्तन के पैटर्न का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
interpretation.es: Youthful Folly representa el patrón de energía y cambio en tu vida ahora mismo.
interpretation.fr: Youthful Folly représente le modèle d'énergie et de changement dans votre vie en ce moment.
interpretation.ja: Youthful Follyは、あなたの人生におけるエネルギーと変化のパターンを表します。

keywords.en: Immaturity requiring education and development, I Ching, Unique Hexagram 4
keywords.zh: Immaturity requiring education and development, 易经, 第4卦

judgement.zh: 需（第5卦）：Patience and waiting for the right time。易经的古老智慧通过这种能量配置与你对话。

judgement.zh: 讼（第6卦）：Litigation and disputes requiring resolution。易经的古老智慧通过这种能量配置与你对话。

This hexagram is distinct from all others - each of the 64 hexagrams offers unique wisdom. Consider how Clarity, brightness, and attachment applies to your current situation, decisions, and path forward. The I Ching provides not rigid rules but profound insights into the patterns of transformation.

judgement.en: Small Exceeding (Hexagram 62): Minor adjustment. The ancient wisdom of the I Ching speaks to your situation through this configuration of energy. This hexagram represents one of the 64 fundamental patterns of change.
judgement.zh: 小过（第62卦）：Minor adjustment。易经的古老智慧通过这种能量配置与你对话。

image.en: The symbolic meaning of Small Exceeding reflects the interplay of the trigrams that form this hexagram. Each of the 64 hexagrams represents a unique pattern of change, and this one speaks specifically to the theme of Minor adjustment.
image.zh: 小过的象征意义反映了组成此卦的卦象之间的相互作用。
image.es: El significado simbólico de Small Exceeding
image.fr: La signification symbolique de Small Exceeding

interpretation.en: Small Exceeding represents the pattern of energy and change in your life right now. The central theme is Minor adjustment. This hexagram is distinct from all others - each of the 64 hexagrams offers unique wisdom. Consider how Minor adjustment applies to your current situation, decisions, and path forward. The I Ching provides not rigid rules but profound insights into the patterns of transformation.
interpretation.zh: 小过代表你此刻能量的模式。中心主题是Minor adjustment。
interpretation.hi: Small Exceeding आपके जीवन में अभी ऊर्जा और परिवर्तन के पैटर्न का प्रतिनिधित्व करता है।
interpretation.es: Small Exceeding representa el patrón de energía y cambio en tu vida ahora mismo.
interpretation.fr: Small Exceeding représente le modèle d'énergie et de changement dans votre vie en ce moment.
interpretation.ja: Small Exceedingは、あなたの人生におけるエネルギーと変化のパターンを表します。
